scripts.build-message: mkdir -p terraform/build && zip -qr terraform/build/process-message.zip process-message/ node_modules/ utils/
scripts.build-extraction: mkdir -p terraform/build && zip -qr terraform/build/extraction.zip extraction/ node_modules/ utils/
scripts.build-authorizer: mkdir -p terraform/build && zip -qr terraform/build/authorizer.zip authorizer/ utils/
scripts.build-proxy: mkdir -p terraform/build && zip -qr terraform/build/proxy.zip proxy/ node_modules/
scripts.build-all: npm run build-message && npm run build-conformance && npm run build-bulkdata && npm run build-extraction && npm run build-authorizer && npm run build-proxy
